metadata.title: CVE-2019-5419 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a possible denial of service vulnerability in Action View (Rails) <5.2.2.1, <5.1.6.2, <5.0.7.2, <4.2.11.1 where specially crafted accept headers can cause action view to consume 100% cpu and make the server unresponsive.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:5.2.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
